name: fes
description: An HTML5, CSS, and Javascript starting point for front-end development.
author: Oliver Farrell & Jonny Haynes

scripts.setup: sudo npm install bower-installer -g && rm -rf source/javascripts/components
scripts.js: jshint source/javascripts/**.js | mkdir build/javascripts | mkdir build/javascripts/templates | mkdir build/javascripts/libraries | cp source/javascripts/modules/**/*.html build/javascripts/templates | cp source/javascripts/libraries/*.js build/javascripts/libraries | cp source/javascripts/libraries/**/*.js build/javascripts/libraries | uglifyjs source/javascripts/libraries/**/*.js source/javascripts/modules/*.js source/javascripts/modules/**/*.js source/javascripts/*.js  -o build/javascripts/application.min.js --source-map build/javascripts/application.min.js.map --source-map-url /build/javascripts/application.min.js.map
scripts.sass: mkdir build/css | touch build/css/main.css | node-sass source/scss/main.scss --output-style compressed build/css/main.css | node-sass source/scss/print.scss --output-style compressed build/css/print.css | node-sass source/scss/ie8.scss --output-style compressed build/css/ie8.css | autoprefixer build/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.build:watch: rm -rf build/ | mkdir build | mkdir build/images | mkdir build/images/template | parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:sass' 'npm run watch:images'
